Title: XXE vulnerability
Description: A potential XML External Entity processing vulnerability has been discovered in the MediaTypeConverter.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.0.0-beta1 before 3.0.1, all versions starting from 2.3.0 before 2.3.7
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.0.0-beta1, all versions starting from 3.0.1, all versions before 2.3.0-stable, all versions starting from 2.3.7
